message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $13,000 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, $13,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the value this product brings is truly unique. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. However, $11,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for it. Can you consider my offer?
